item.title: ACCA is sponsoring a MOOC on FutureLearn that grants learners an exemption from the F1 paper
item.description:
The Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (ACCA) is breaking new ground as the first professional accountancy body to use massive open online courses (MOOCs) for professional recognition. They are partnering with FutureLearn, a UK-based social learning platform, to offer free online courses in accounting, finance, and business. This partnership aims to reach a global audience, providing valuable supplementary knowledge for professionals and introducing career paths to those new to the field...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/acca-is-sponsoring-a-mooc-on-futurelearn-that-grants-learners-an-exemption-from-the-f1-paper/
